SELECT_INTERFACE_LANGUAGE.FINISHED: The new interface language has been set!

STUDY_NEW_LANGUAGE.FINISHED: The language has been added to study

ADD_FLASHCARDS.TITLE: Add flashcards
ADD_FLASHCARDS.ASK_INPUT:
Input flashcards in format: word/phrase - translation
Write each flashcard on a new line to add them
ADD_FLASHCARDS.FINISHED: The flashcards have been added successfully!

DEL_FLASHCARDS.TITLE: Remove some flashcards
DEL_FLASHCARDS.ASK_INPUT: Input words you want to remove. Write each flashcard on a new line to remove them
DEL_FLASHCARDS.FINISHED: The flashcards have been removed successfully!

CHANGE_FLASHCARD.TITLE: Change a flashcard
CHANGE_FLASHCARD.ASK_INPUT: Input the word you want to change

ADD_TEXT.TITLE: Add a text
ADD_TEXT.ASK_WORDS: Input words. Write each word on a new line to add
ADD_TEXT.PROMPT_SAVE: Would you like to save the text?

STUDYING.ALMOST_CORRECT_ANSWER: You are almost right! The correct answer is
STUDYING.SYNONYM: You are right, but you wrote a synonym. Really answer is

MODELS.WITH_PHOTO: Photo as word descriptor + write answer
MODELS.WITH_PHOTO_AND_OPTIONS: Photo as word descriptor + select answer

QUESTIONS.ASK_ADD: Would toy like to save this?
QUESTIONS.ASK_DEL: Are you sure you want to delete this?

MIDDLEWARES.YOU_DONT_LEARN_THE_LANGUAGE: You are not learning the selected language
MIDDLEWARES.YOU_ALREADY_LEARN_THE_LANGUAGE: You are already studying the language
MIDDLEWARES.WORD_NOT_FOUND: The input word is not found in your vocabulary
MIDDLEWARES.ALL_LANGUAGES_ALREADY_STUDY: You are already studying all languages
MIDDLEWARES.MUST_BE_MIN_10_FLASHCARDS: Must have at least 10 flashcards in vocabulary to study them
MIDDLEWARES.ALREADY_SELECTED_INTERFACE_LANGUAGE: The language is already set as your interface language
MIDDLEWARES.CANT_STUDY_NATIVE_LANGUAGE: You can't study your native language
MIDDLEWARES.IS_NOT_LEARN_ANY_LANGUAGE: You have not been learning any language
MIDDLEWARES.MUST_BE_MIN_10_ADD_WORDS: Must have at least 10 words to generate text

VALIDATORS.WORD_INCORRECT_LANGUAGE: The input or its part is in an incorrect language. Words must be written in the learning language
VALIDATORS.NOT_DIFFERENCE_OLD_NEW_VER_FLASHCARD: The new version of the flashcard is the same as the old version

ERRORS.UNKNOWN_ERROR: Unknown error! Please try again later!
